dataList.name: Платные примогемы
dataList.desc: Какая то конская залупа в виде цветка. Используется для круток и покупки героина
dataList.flavor: КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ

dataList.name: Героиновая закладка
dataList.desc: Плата кладмену для входа в данжи
dataList.flavor: Пакетик с героином обернутый в зеленый скотч внутри какой то коробки

dataList.name: Билетик для круток
dataList.desc: Можно использовать для одной крутки в баннерах
dataList.flavor: КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ

dataList.name: Крутой билетик для круток
dataList.desc: Можно использовать для десяти круток в баннерах
dataList.flavor: КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ

dataList.name: Пиздатый билетик для круток
dataList.desc: Можно использовать для 10 круток, с гарантом на трехзвездочную айдишку
dataList.flavor: КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ КРУТИТЬ

dataList.name: [Season 1] 3★ Guarantee Decaextraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform 10 extractions where one 3★ Identity from [Season 1] is guaranteed to appear.
dataList.flavor: A special ticket with a mark on it. It can extract an Identity from a world of unlikely possibilities with certainty. The paper is fiercely beating and pulsing.

dataList.name: [Season 2] 3★ Guarantee Decaextraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform 10 extractions where one 3★ Identity from [Season 2] is guaranteed to appear.
dataList.flavor: A special ticket with a mark on it. It can extract an Identity from a world of unlikely possibilities with certainty. The paper is fiercely beating and pulsing.

dataList.name: [Season 3] 3★ Guarantee Decaextraction Ticket
dataList.desc: Can be used to perform 10 extractions where one 3★ Identity from [Season 3] is guaranteed to appear.
dataList.flavor: A special ticket with a mark on it. It can extract an Identity from a world of unlikely possibilities with certainty. The paper is fiercely beating and pulsing.

dataList.name: Светяшке
dataList.desc: Валюта, которая используется для повышения уровня связи
dataList.flavor: светяшке))

dataList.name: Бомж-билет на уровень
dataList.desc: Дает 50 опыта айдишке
dataList.flavor: Даже представить не могу, в каких условиях эта хуйня может быть использована”

dataList.name: Хуйня-билет на уровень
dataList.desc: Дает 200 опыта айдишке
dataList.flavor: Хуевый конечно билет, но для экономии подойдет”

dataList.name: Нихуевый-билет на уровень
dataList.desc: Дает 1000 опыта айдишке
dataList.flavor: А вот этой хуйней уже можно нихуево вкачаться”

dataList.name: Ахуенный-билет на уровень
dataList.desc: Дает 3000 опыта айдишке
dataList.flavor: 50 таких билетиков - и у тебя будет 50ур. Ахуенно же

dataList.name: Бомж-буст на уровень
dataList.desc: Увеличивает уровень айдишки до 10.
dataList.flavor: Откуда ты эту хуйню ваще взял”

dataList.name: Хуйня-буст на уровень
dataList.desc: Увеличивает уровень айдишки до 20.
dataList.flavor: Я хуею, откуда оно у тебя?”

dataList.name: Нихуевый-буст на уровень
dataList.desc: Увеличивает уровень айдишки до 30.
dataList.flavor: Хуй”

dataList.name: Ахуенный-буст на уровень
dataList.desc: Увеличивает уровень айдишки до  40.
dataList.flavor: бля да где ты эту хуйеню то спиздил

dataList.name: Протеиновый билетик
dataList.desc: Повышает уровень айдишки на 40, и уровень связи до 4
dataList.flavor: вкусная хуйня, но вродь щас хуй получишь. Если ты это получил - напиши переводчикам, исправим данный текст

dataList.name: Пачка герыча
dataList.desc: Восстанавливает 60 героина при использовании
dataList.flavor: Мощная доза героина

dataList.name: Ящик со светяшке
dataList.desc: Откройте, дабы получить от одной до трех светяшек
dataList.flavor: ехехех светяшке

dataList.name: [Season 1] Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of random Sinners.
dataList.flavor:
Egoshards were randomly harvested and stored in these boxes. Its contents are a mystery.
When you hold one in a quiet place, you can hear small fusses.

dataList.name: [Season 1] Nominable Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of a Sinner of choice.
dataList.flavor:
A crate that yields Egoshards of a Sinner you choose.
According to Фауст, its contents are determined once a manager makes their decision.

dataList.name: [Season 2] Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of random Sinners.
dataList.flavor:
Egoshards were randomly harvested and stored in these boxes. Its contents are a mystery.
When you hold one in a quiet place, you can hear small fusses.

dataList.name: [Season 2] Nominable Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of a Sinner of choice.
dataList.flavor:
A crate that yields Egoshards of a Sinner you choose.
According to Фауст, its contents are determined once a manager makes their decision.

dataList.name: [Season 3] Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 random Egoshards.
dataList.flavor:
Egoshards were randomly harvested and stored in these boxes. Its contents are a mystery.
When you hold one in a quiet place, you can hear small fusses.

dataList.name: [Season 3] Nominable Egoshard Crate
dataList.desc: Open to receive 1-3 Egoshards of a Sinner of choice.
dataList.flavor:
A crate that yields Egoshards of a Sinner you choose.
According to Фауст, its contents are determined once a manager makes their decision.

dataList.name: [Season 1] Санечка’s Egoshard
dataList.desc: Used for purchasing Санечка’s Identities, E.G.O, and Thread from the Dispenser.
dataList.flavor:
Fleeting moments from any point within the Sinner’s lifetime, condensed into physical form. The shards float in the air.
Possibilities are transient things; they drift in the realm of uncertainty unless seized.

dataList.name: Season 2 [Selected Sinner]’s Egoshard
dataList.desc: 재화 등장 확률 상세 표시용(name 만 번역해주세요)

dataList.name: Въебано [Гарант]
dataList.desc: 천장 재화 표시용(name 만 번역해주세요)

dataList.name: Bus-modifying Scrap
dataList.desc:
Miscellaneous junk like rusted plates and bolts ripped from the backs of trash crabs.
Could be used for modifying Mephistopheles.

dataList.name: Rare Horseshoe with Bus-modifying Scrap
dataList.desc:
A large horseshoe-shaped item taken from the king trash crab.
It could substitute several pieces of scrap, or so we're told.

dataList.name: Egoshards
dataList.desc: 자판기 재화 표시용(name 만 번역해주세요)

dataList.name: Trinkets Sack
dataList.desc:
A sack full of trinkets and decorations hastily taken from the Gift Factory.
Член Кихот will make good use of these to spruce up the Mephistopheles' interiors.

dataList.name: Huge Trinkets Sack
dataList.desc:
A huge sack filled to the brim with trinkets and decorations from the Gift Factory.
Член Кихот will make good use of these to spruce up the Mephistopheles' interiors.

dataList.name: Bloodied Scabbard
dataList.desc:
Used to purchase various rewards from the Обмен наград menu.

<color=#a16a3b>Those who wield blades in life leave behind bloodied scabbards in death.
The true abode of those who walk the path of blades is their scabbard.</color>

dataList.name: Resentful Scabbard
dataList.desc:
Used to purchase various rewards from the Обмен наград menu.

<color=#a16a3b>One who wields their blade with deep resentment is called a Demon of the Blade.
Demon of the Blade no longer has need of a scabbard; yet they carry it, as that resentment is tinged with a lingering attachment.</color>

dataList.name: Карманные часы
dataList.desc:
Everyone has their own timepiece, with varying time scales.
Time that goes by quickly. Time that lingers.
The hours are always misaligned.

dataList.name: Набор карманных часов
dataList.desc:
The same destination awaits every timepiece.
The hours finally align when the hands stop ticking down the seconds, when one breathes their final lungful of air.

dataList.name: Civilian Recov. Pack
dataList.desc:
Used to purchase various rewards from the Обмен наград menu.

<color=#a16a3b>Notice to Cleanup Agents: please collect and store a single passenger's parts in this pack. No matter how difficult it may appear to collect their parts, do note that there is a single strand of vein connecting the passenger's parts together. Imagine you are spinning a yarn ball into shape, and patiently collect them one by one.</color>

dataList.name: Fixer Recov. Pack
dataList.desc:
Spawns rarely. Converted to 20 Civilian Recov. Pack immediately upon acquisition.

<color=#a16a3b>On occasion, you may have to work on passengers equipped with prosthetics.
Please note that even full-body prosthetics do not remove the passenger's brain.
Any prosthetic parts recognized by the brain as the passenger's own body will be connected by veins, so there is no need to worry about mix-and-matching them together.
Remember: blood is thicker than water.</color>

dataList.name: Протеиновый модуль
dataList.desc: Повышает уровень связи айдишки до 4
dataList.flavor: Колоть в вену

dataList.name: Протеиновый модуль ЭГО (WAW)
dataList.desc: Повышает уровень связи эго до 4 (Используется только на ЭГО уровня WAW или ниже)
dataList.flavor: Колоть в вену под действием коррозии (если вены нет - колоть в хуй)

dataList.name: Билетик халявной айдишки(Сезон 1)
dataList.desc: Используйте это, дабы получить халявную айдишку первого сезона на выбор
dataList.flavor: халяву люблю пиздец

dataList.name: Билетик халявного ЭГО(Сезон 1)
dataList.desc: Используйте это, дабы получить халявное ЭГО первого сезона на выбор
dataList.flavor: халяву люблю пиздец

dataList.name: Season 4 Uptie & Threadspinning only Shard (Universal)
dataList.desc: Can be used to Uptie Identities and Threadspin E.G.O for all Sinners.
dataList.flavor:
A universal shard that can be used to Uptie or Threadspin Identities & E.G.O for all Sinners.
However, these shards cannot be used to extract Identities or E.G.O, no matter how many of these shards one collects.
'These shards are products of our research into the omnitransformative nature of Golden Boughs; it can be used to fill any fathoms or worlds of mirrors. Huh? Extractions? Of course not. Its one-size-fits-all-worlds nature would mean that it obviously cannot have been made *for* any specific world, right? - LCA Mirror World Observatorium Department Chief Researcher'

dataList.name: Протеиновый модуль ЭГО (HE)
dataList.desc: Повышает уровень связи эго до 4 (Используется только на ЭГО уровня HE или ниже)
dataList.flavor: Колоть в вену под действием коррозии (если вены нет - колоть в хуй)

dataList.name: Amassed Data
dataList.desc:
Used to purchase various rewards from the Обмен наград menu.

<color=#a16a3b>Various disorganized and trivial documentation on LCB, Distortions, and the Peccatula are haphazardly scribbled here. These data have been collected by the LCE—messy records of tests, experiments, and research litter the papers.

'It is not the duty of a researcher to organize their findings. That is the assistants' responsibility.'</color>

dataList.name: Classified Data
dataList.desc:
Spawns rarely. Converted to 20 Amassed Data immediately upon acquisition.

<color=#a16a3b>Classified data collected by Hohenheim himself, available for viewing only for LCE's assistant researchers. It contains all kinds of in-depth information about Limbus Company—from each Sinner's personal information(Birthdays, birthplaces, etc.) to analyses on Abnormalities and Distortions contained within the LCE.

'The enumeration of data alone is worthless. What matters is which data connects to which, when they are unveiled, and how they are put to use. Only then is data transformed into intelligence of worth.' - Anonymous LCA Officer</color>

dataList.name: Билетик халявной айдишки (Сезон 2)
dataList.desc: Используйте это, дабы получить халявную айдишку второго сезона сезона на выбор
dataList.flavor: халяву люблю пиздец

dataList.name: Протеиновый билетик №2
dataList.desc: Повышает уровень айдишки на 50, и уровень связи до 4
dataList.flavor: пиздец вкусная хуйня

dataList.name: [Цилиндр с говном Говночистов]
dataList.desc: Используется для покупки ивентовых предметов
dataList.flavor: хз че все ноют, свиперы легчайшие враги

dataList.name: [Бачок с говном Говночистов]
dataList.desc: Маленький шанс на получение. Конвертируется сразу в 20 цилиндров с говном

dataList.name: Starlight of Immortality
dataList.desc:
Used in Mirror Dungeons.

<color=#a16a3b>Starlight that can be collected only as long as the Mirror of Immortality remains open. Wish as people might to weave new tales from Starlight, they can only scavenge for what earthbound Starlight there remains—for the stars in the sky are no more.</color>

dataList.name: Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren
dataList.desc:
Used to purchase various rewards from the Reward Exchange menu.

<color=#a16a3b>The Wise are unshaken, the Brave are unafraid, and the Benevolent are untroubled. No matter what discipline it may be, to build the pillars of learning upon the three foundations of Zhi, Yong, and Ren is to build a soaring tower. Which summons forth an intriguing question: can not all of education be condensed into Zhi, Yong, and Ren? - Tianji Star(天機星)</color>

dataList.name: Definitely Not A Secret Scroll
dataList.desc:
Spawns rarely. Converted to 20 Intro to Zhi, Yong, Ren immediately upon acquisition.

<color=#a16a3b>A scroll filled with esoteric knowledge. It allows its readers to rapidly absorb its contents, wisdom or technique, disregarding the basics that must come before the learning. None know yet whether it is the paper that is a Singularity, or the letters that are a Singularity, or the ink that forms them that is a Singularity. This likely matters very little to those who covet this secret scroll. Yet, remember well that food ingested in haste risks sickness and vomiting. Always be acutely aware of your capabilities. - A Certain Master</color>
